item.title: Will This Old Plane Fly Again?
item.description: A careful look at the restoration of an aging aircraft as experts assess whether it can return to the air or remain a display piece. Which part of the evaluation interests you most?

media:content.media:title: Will This Old Plane Fly Again?
media:content.media:description: A careful look at the restoration of an aging aircraft as experts assess whether it can return to the air or remain a display piece. Which part of the evaluation interests you most?

item.title: This Is What Thousands of Hours Finally Look Like
item.description: After countless late nights, setbacks, and steady progress, the results are finally visible. This piece highlights the transformation that only time, skill, and persistence can create — a finished product that proves the effort was worth it.

media:content.media:title: This Is What Thousands of Hours Finally Look Like
media:content.media:description: After countless late nights, setbacks, and steady progress, the results are finally visible. This piece highlights the transformation that only time, skill, and persistence can create — a finished product that proves the effort was worth it.

item.title: Abandoned Airplanes — Will They Start After Years
item.description: Several long‑parked aircraft are finally getting a chance to come back to life. This piece follows the inspections, the first attempts to turn the engines over, and the surprises that come with trying to start planes that haven’t moved in years.

media:content.media:title: Abandoned Airplanes — Will They Start After Years
media:content.media:description: Several long‑parked aircraft are finally getting a chance to come back to life. This piece follows the inspections, the first attempts to turn the engines over, and the surprises that come with trying to start planes that haven’t moved in years.

item.title: Jet Experience Inspired by Mötley Crüe
item.description: Take a look at a jet ride experience themed around Mötley Crüe, including price and onboard highlights. Would you try this high-flying music adventure?

media:content.media:title: Jet Experience Inspired by Mötley Crüe
media:content.media:description: Take a look at a jet ride experience themed around Mötley Crüe, including price and onboard highlights. Would you try this high-flying music adventure?

item.title: Electric Car Left Idle for 20 Years
item.description: look at an electric vehicle stored for two decades and what it takes to bring it back to life. Could it run again?

media:content.media:title: Electric Car Left Idle for 20 Years
media:content.media:description: look at an electric vehicle stored for two decades and what it takes to bring it back to life. Could it run again?

item.title: Fixing Airplanes with Simple Materials
item.description: A hands-on look at creative aircraft repairs using basic supplies and teamwork. Can simple methods really solve complex problems?

media:content.media:title: Fixing Airplanes with Simple Materials
media:content.media:description: A hands-on look at creative aircraft repairs using basic supplies and teamwork. Can simple methods really solve complex problems?

item.title: Searching for SR-71 at the Smithsonian Museum
item.description: A visit to the Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum to explore the SR-71’s history and aviation legacy. What makes it so iconic?
